comprehension.description: Understanding of the task and environment to come up with appropriate thoughts and actions

planning.description: Ability to plan steps to accomplish the given task

adaptability.description: Responding to environment feedback and adjusting actions or plans accordingly

action_execution.description: Proper execution of actions based on task requirements and environment state

efficiency.description: Completing the task in an optimal number of steps

format.description: Adherence to the required output format

legal_actions.description: Use of legal actions provided by the task and not using any illegal actions

termination.description: Sending 'TERMINATE' only when instructions are clear or the task is insolvable
